manifest.author: iamzainnnn
manifest.changelog:
- Enabled swipeable navigation tabs.
(Now you can swipe between the tabs.)
- Enabled story storylines
(Probably it's not working yet.)
- Enabled full screen reels.
- Enabled friends tab in reels.
- Enabled rounded corners while sharing feed posts to the story.
- Enabled prism direct icon.
- Enabled stickers in the comments.
- Enabled account switcher in the notifications tab.
- Enabled new music notes vinyl.
- Enhanced animation while adding a profile picture.
- Enabled watch and comment on reels clip.
- Enabled stories tray in following.
- Enabled google photos in album picker.
- Enabled ai edit in stories postcap toolbar.
- Enabled add to spotify on stories.
- Enabled reels tab in location page.
- Updated floaty comments design.
- Updated meta ai chat interface.
- Updated some button design.
- Updated notes format button design.
- Updated some icon designs.
- Updated some UI elements.
- Changed header position.
- Changed profile position in reels clip.
- Enhanced haptic feedback.
- Disabled valentine flags.
- Simplified reels more menu.
- Fixed unavailable reels issue.
- Fixed some weird UI.
- Brought back the group filter in dm.
- Disabled unnecessary things.
- Disabled non skippable ads.
- Removed unavailable flags.
- Fixed some minor bugs and issues and improved it for a better experience.
